name: The Spring Shopping Mall
description: A premier shopping destination offering a wide range of international and local brands, diverse dining options, and entertainment facilities including a cinema.
address: Jalan Simpang Tiga, 93300 Kuching, Sarawak, Malaysia

name: Vivacity Megamall
description: Currently the largest mall in Kuching, featuring international clothing brands, two food courts, playgrounds, and an IMAX cinema.
address: Jalan Wan Alwi, 93350 Kuching, Sarawak, Malaysia

name: AEON Mall Kuching Central
description: A modern shopping mall with diverse retail outlets, dining options, and entertainment facilities.
address: Jalan Tun Ahmad Zaidi Adruce, 93200 Kuching, Sarawak, Malaysia
businessHours: Sun–Thu: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Fri–Sat & Eve of PH: 10:00 AM – 10:30 PM

name: Boulevard Shopping Mall
description: A comprehensive mall with a wide range of retail stores, eateries, and entertainment options.
address: Jalan Datuk Tawi Sli, 93250 Kuching, Sarawak, Malaysia

name: Plaza Merdeka
description: A spacious mall featuring domestic and international retailers, fast-food chains, and a kids' play area near historical sites.
